titleStmt.title: The fyfte eglog of Alexandre Barclay of the cytezen and vplondyshman. Here after foloweth the prologe.
Eclogue. 5
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Alexander, 1475?-1552.
Baptista, Mantuanus, 1448-1516. Bucolica. 6.

publicationStmt.publisher: In flete strete, at the sygne of sonne, by Wynkyn de Worde,
